## Matrix4.getMatrix3() method

Gets the upper left 3x3 matrix of the provided matrix.

**Signature:**

```typescript
static getMatrix3(matrix: Matrix4, result?: Matrix3): Matrix3;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  matrix | [Matrix4](./toygl.matrix4.md) | The matrix to use. |
|  result | Matrix3 | _(Optional)_ The object onto which to store the result. |

**Returns:**

Matrix3

The modified result parameter.
